snippet: European governments are increasingly nervous about the possibility of an Israel strike on Iran and have been trying to persuade the government of Benjamin Netanyahu to give tougher sanctions on Tehran time to work.
abstract: European governments are increasingly nervous about the possibility of an Israel strike on Iran and have been trying to persuade the government of Benjamin Netanyahu to give tougher sanctions on Tehran time to work.

headline.main: Europe Presses Israel to Put Faith in Iran Sanctions
